Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you based on your needs and preferences. Given its high value and quality, I'm proposing a special offer for you today. For a limited time, you can purchase this exceptional item for $100. This is an exclusive opportunity tailored just for you, considering the significant worth this product holds for you personally. Don't miss out on this chance to enhance your experience with our product at a highly favorable price. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $100. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $100
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
